author: Santosh Patnaik
title: ‘Export of HCQ will not hit India’s fight against COVID’
description: Production can be scaled up within no time, says Pharmexcil D-G
content:
Revocation of ban on the export of Hydroxychloroquine, an affordable drug for treatment of malaria, will not hit Indias fight against COVID-19, says a top official of the Pharmaceuticals Export Promotion Council of India (Pharmexcil).
